entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @ProjectLincoln @Judson4Congress @realDonaldTrump’s ineptitude in his handling Covid19 made the stay at home, social distancing and mask wearing orders Americans have endured since March, as well as the devastation of the economy might have well been for nothing.
